filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.您好,歡迎收聽口說英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we are going to talk about traffic jams.這個單元,我們要來練習怎麼談論交通阻塞。首先,我們來聽下這個單元的問題以及示範回答。Exercise 實戰演練
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Question
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Exercise 實戰演練Question
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這裡要談論的是塞車的經驗。那麼說的時候,你就可以說When it happened? 什麼時候的事呢?Where you were going? 你要去哪邊呢?How long you had to wait? 這個是最煩的。要等多久啊?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我們就這麼說
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: I happened to have a very bad experience of getting stuck in the traffic jam a few days ago.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: I happened to know Mary.Have a very bad experience of getting stuck in the traffic jam.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 明明就是普通的一天,可是我花了兩小時才回家。Ordinary 是一個形容詞,表示是普通的、平凡的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 表示是做什麼事花了多少的時間。There was traffic congestion on the highway, which I come home by every day.沒有理由欸,就在我平常回家的那條公路上塞得很嚴重。就是沒有理由。Traffic congestion 也是交通阻塞。要注意的是Traffic congestion 是不可數名詞。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以不可以加上A,也不能加上S。我等了幾乎要一個小時,最後車子才開始走。意思就是車子終於開始走了。我交通幾乎花了兩個小時。Nearly 是副詞,表示是幾乎。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: It was unbearable 真受不了啊。Unbearable 是一個形容詞,叫做令人無法忍受的。最後我們可以說下感想。交通阻塞真的是讓人家很不愉快。The feeling was unpleasant 這是這個句子裡面最核心的表達。就是這個感覺很不愉快。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Unpleasant 是一個形容詞,就是令人不愉快的。塞車毀了我整個晚上。Ruin 是一個動詞,就是毀壞了。那晚後來我什麼也沒做。For the rest of the night 就是那晚剩下來的時間。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 是一個騙語,就表示其餘的剩下來的。如果沒有塞車,我就能夠準時回家了。這是一個假設語氣的句型。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 是一個英文的慣用語,表示那天運氣很糟。這是一個假設語氣的文法。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 就是如果現在沒有什麼,那麼就會要特別注意。B 動詞一定要用 were。我們來看一下例子。如果現在沒有了電,那麼生活就會很不方便。他說如果現在沒有密封的話,那會發生什麼事呢?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 如果沒有了壞人,那也就不會有好律師了。這是英國的大文豪 Charles Dickens 所說的話。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 形容詞無法忍受的。形容詞令人不愉快的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 今天這個單元我們講的是 Traffic jams 交通阻塞。希望您都學會了。最後請記得,每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通。我是奇兵老師。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我們下次見。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a time when you were stuck in a traffic jam. 遇到塞車好討厭用英文說.json
